meanings.definition: In a way that does not stimulate the desire to eat.
meanings.sent2: The cafeteria food looked unappetizingly dull.
meanings.sent3: The chef tried to make the dish look more appealing, but it still ended up unappetizingly plain.
meanings.sent4: The smell of burnt popcorn filled the room unappetizingly.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the moldy bread was unappetizingly repulsive.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is not appealing to the taste or appetite.
meanings.sent1: The expired milk smelled unappetizingly sour.
meanings.sent2: The overcooked steak was unappetizingly tough.
meanings.sent3: The cat unappetizingly turned away from the fish-flavored treat.
meanings.sent4: The once vibrant fruits now looked unappetizingly shriveled.
meanings.sent5: The greasy pizza was unappetizingly greasy and soggy.
